io.spine.server.entity.storage

Class EntityColumnCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.storage.EntityColumnCache

  • @Internal
public class EntityColumnCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A class designated to store cached entity column metadata for a single Entity class.

    The cache remains empty on creation. The column metadata is retrieved on the first access to the cache instance and then stored in it.

    The order in which entity columns are stored, is retained for the access operations.

    See Also:
    EntityColumn, Columns

    • Method Detail

      • initializeFor

        public static EntityColumnCache initializeFor(java.lang.Class<? extends Entity> entityClass)
        Creates an instance of EntityColumnCache for the given Entity class.

        The column metadata will not be retrieved and stored on creation. Instead, the cache instance will wait for the first access to it to cache entity columns.

        Parameters:
        entityClass - the class for which entity columns should be obtained and cached
        Returns:
        new EntityColumnCache instance

      • findColumn

        public EntityColumn findColumn(java.lang.String columnName)
        Finds cached metadata for the entity column with a given name.

        If the column metadata is not yet obtained and cached, this method will retrieve and cache it.

        If there is no column with the given name in the Entity class managed by this cache, the method will throw IllegalArgumentException.

        Parameters:
        columnName - the name of the searched column
        Returns:
        found entity column
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the EntityColumn is not found

      • getColumns

        public java.util.Collection<EntityColumn> getColumns()
        Retrieves all entity columns for the Entity class managed by this cache.

        If the column metadata is not yet obtained and cached, this method will retrieve and cache it.

        Returns:
        entity column Collection for the managed Entity class

      • ensureColumnsCached

        public void ensureColumnsCached()
        Obtains and caches EntityColumn data if it is not yet cached.

        If the data is already retrieved and cached, this method does nothing.
